Summary: Flexible, high-performance list/grid control with layouts, selection, grouping, scrolling, empty views, and item interactions.
Remarks: CollectionView presents lists of data with configurable layouts (linear or grid), supports single/multiple selection, grouping with headers/footers, programmatic scrolling and scroll events, empty view placeholders, and per-item interactions (SwipeView). It’s a modern, performant alternative to ListView.
